game.name: Moon Garden Optimizer
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A puzzle strategy game, and a deckbuilder without a deck. Cultivate a garden while conserving water. Your only opponent is access to an undo button, and a sense of perfectionism.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A puzzle strategy game, and a deckbuilder without a deck. Cultivate a garden while conserving water. Your only opponent is access to an undo button, and a sense of perfectionism.
